Package com.jsyn.devices

Class AndroidAudioForJSyn

java.lang.Object
com.jsyn.devices.AndroidAudioForJSyn
All Implemented Interfaces:
AudioDeviceManager
public class AndroidAudioForJSyn extends Object implements AudioDeviceManager
Implement JSyn's AudioDeviceManager. Use Android AudioTrack to access the audio hardware.
